> Looks great!
> 
> Is it possible to use this [robot](https://github.com/AlibabaDR/Collabobot) in other github projects?

Of course, this robot is a collaborate framework which provides some basic services and you can use it on any project, I am still working on finish the basic functions and README file to help with quick start.

> > If there is any problem with the direct use `reconnectExecutorFuture`ï¼Ÿ
> > `reconnectExecutorFuture .cancel(true)`
> 
> @CrazyHZM This is defensive fault tolerance, calling `reconnectExecutorFuture .cancel(true)` will have no side effects.

thank you.
